tips.shiftToOpenGraph: Hold shift to open course graph directly.

validation.atLeastOneOption: At least one option must be selected
validation.selectOneOption: Please select at least one search option.

banner.announcement: We're still actively developing this site. If you encounter any issues, please report them!

announcement: We just launched! Please star us on GitHub

hero.title: Course exploration, made easy
hero.description: Explore the courses offered by the UW-Madison in a visual and interactive way.
hero.disclaimer: UW Course Map is not affiliated with the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Upload your transcript to automatically analyze and visualize your completed courses.

visualFirst.title: Visual First
visualFirst.description: View an interactive map of a department and course relationships to explore course offerings.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Built by UW-Madison students, for students. Contribute to our open-source project on GitHub.

dataFriendly.title: Data Friendly
dataFriendly.description: Download or immediately access our data via API to build your own tools and insights.

cta.title: Start Exploring Courses
cta.description: Start browsing UW's courses and our course maps, or head over to our GitHub to see our roadmap and contribute to the project.

statistics.title: Aggregated Statistics
statistics.subtitle: Dynamic Insights from Multiple Sources
statistics.description: UW Course Map brings everything into one place—pulling data from Rate My Professor, Madgrades, UW-Madison's Course & Enroll, Course Guide, and more—so you can view key metrics (GPA, prerequisite paths, average ratings, distributions, etc.) all in a single dashboard.
